mapper.select: select id,menbership_type_id menbershipTypeId,user_id userId,per_id perId,deposit from membership_application where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into membership_application(id,menbership_type_id menbershipTypeId,user_id userId,per_id perId,deposit) values (#{id},#(menbershipTypeId),#{userId},#{perId},#{deposit})
